summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Government Form Helper web application. All backend APIs and frontend functionality working perfectly. AI-powered form assistance is fully operational with proper integration between frontend and Gemini AI backend.
passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint responding correctly
Form help endpoint returns proper JSON with clarification_question, advice, warning fields
Frontend loads successfully with Passport Application Form visible
All form sections present (Applicant Details, Family Details, Education & Employment, Address, Emergency Contact)
AI Helper Panel opens when clicking form fields
AI Helper Panel displays response cards (Question, Advice, Warning) after loading
Loading shimmer state displays during AI processing
Multiple form field interactions work properly
Form buttons (Save Draft, Submit) are clickable
ECR/ECNR field integration provides relevant passport guidance
